item.title: What this blog is about?
item.description: Let’s start this journey! Photo by Matt Duncan on Unsplash Welcome to my blog, and thank you for joining me on this new journey. If you’re here, you might already know me from my writings on Medium , where I’ve shared my insights and explorations in the realms of software engineering, artificial intelligence, and bioinformatics. My name is Dzmitry Hramyka, a software engineer with a penchant for the intricate dance between technology and life’s myriad facets.
